name: Julián Garcia
content: Julian Garcia Gallego - Monash University Julian Garcia Gallego public CV View Scopus Profile Julian Garcia Gallego Assoc Professor Associate Professor, Department of Data Science & AI https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9639-489X EmailJulian.Garciamonashedu 20032025 Research activity per year Personal profile BiographyDr Julian Garcia is a Senior Lecturer at the Faculty of Information Technology, Monash University. He is interested in understanding how agents can learn to cooperate in natural and artificlal settings. Related Links: Julian Garcia Julian GarciaMonash teaching commitmentDr Julian Garcia has experience as the Chief Examiner for the following units in the Faculty of IT: FIT1008/FIT2085 Introduction to computer scienceFIT1016/FIT2044 Advanced project level 1FIT1029 Algorithmic problem solvingFIT2082 Research project 2FIT4012 Advanced topics in computational science Julian has experience as the Lecturer for the following units in the Faculty of IT: FIT1008/FIT2085 Introduction to computer scienceFIT1016/FIT2044 Advanced project level 1FIT1029 Algorithmic problem solvingFIT2082 Research project 2FIT4012 Advanced topics in computational science Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all. This person’s work contributes towards the following SDG(s): Education/Academic qualificationEconomics / Game Theory, Doctor of Philosophy, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam (VU University)Award Date: 29 Jun 2011Computer Science and Computer Engineering, Ingeniero de Sistemas y Computación, Universidad Nacional de Colombia (National University of Colombia)Award Date: 2 Apr 2004 Collaborations and top research areas from the last five years Recent external collaboration on country/territory level.
